channel.title: Nevermind
channel.description: I bet you guys think you're cool. Removed because of flamers. How could you not just help me? I bet you probably just don't even know how to do it yourself. So if you can't be helpful, don't post comments.

item.title: Nevermind
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:4, topic:288099”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=380902.msg2862829#msg2862829 date=1247273262]
He’s asking how, not asking for someone to do it for him.
[/quote]

Well how would you go about teaching him how to write a ban command anyway? That would just be spoonfeeding.[/quote]

By explaining it, like;

Write a command to ban the player’s IP/account name, and make the IP/account name save to a file. Check upon login if there IP/account is banned, if so, then don’t allow them to connect.

If he doesn’t understand how to do it, well then, that’s his problem.

Read full topic
